name: Guide Documentation
author: tscburak
description: A flexible, comprehensive documentation component for creating beautiful guides, tutorials, how-tos, user manuals, and technical documentation. Supports multiple content types including code blocks, lists, callouts, step-by-step instructions, prerequisites, and related resources. Perfect for software documentation, tutorials, onboarding guides, and knowledge bases.

name: Daily Meeting Report
author: tscburak
description: A comprehensive daily meeting report summary that includes meeting details, attendees, agenda items, decisions made, action items, and next steps. Perfect for documenting team meetings, project updates, and stakeholder communications.

name: API Documentation
author: tscburak
description: Comprehensive API documentation component for displaying REST API endpoints, request/response schemas, authentication methods, and code examples. Perfect for API reference guides, developer documentation, and technical specifications.

name: Weekly Table
author: tscburak
description: A clear, flexible table to plan and track your week perfect for meal plans, workouts, study routines, chores and more.

name: Agenda
author: tscburak
description: To keep your day organized, good ui to be motivated.

name: Cover Letter
author: tscburak
description: A clean, print-ready layout that organizes LLM-generated cover letters into well-defined sections: header, body, and closing.

name: Check List
author: tscburak
description: Make sure you complete or collect everything you planned earlier.
